products.title: Basix Blackout Alabaster Cream 127mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Basix blackout alabaster cream 127mm vertical blind in cream. Made to measure from 13.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This 127mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This cool-toned cream 127mm vertical blind, a traditional neutral shade, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and cream goes with nearly anything, whether its wooden accessories and floors or modern minimalist themes. Dress your bedroom or living room with this stylish vertical blind, which as well as being a blackout fabric is anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

products.productdescription: The light hue of the richmond (blackout) in cream belies the effectiveness of its blackout properties, formed from the thick, opaque material from which it is made. The louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light into the room, and when closed, none can filter through.Ensure that your visitors have a great night's sleep by hanging the cream in the guest bedroom. This blind will match a number of style choices, particularly modern, but try teaming it with a tranquil sage green for a relaxing and convivial vibe.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Ajanta (blackout), cream - vertical blind a dark, mature cream, the ajanta (blackout) in cream is a stylish, neutral, and practical blind. White crackle patterning doesn't detract from the gentle shimmer of the fabric, and its easiness to clean and adjust
products.productdescription: A dark, mature cream, the ajanta (blackout) in cream is a stylish, neutral, and practical blind. White crackle patterning doesn't detract from the gentle shimmer of the fabric, and its easiness to clean and adjustable louvres make this a functional option. For freshness and vitality, with a hint of subtle sophistication, settle the cream in amongst duck egg blue units and country wooden worktops in the kitchen. Or for a luxurious yet pragmatic bathroom, pair with mocha browns and soft golds.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Spun Pearl - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), spun pearl - vertical blind origin (blackout)'s spun pearl is a strong and vivid shade of grey that will work hard to offset other, brighter colours. The simple, smooth texture of the fabric creates easily movable louvres, which can be
products.productdescription: Origin (blackout)'s spun pearl is a strong and vivid shade of grey that will work hard to offset other, brighter colours. The simple, smooth texture of the fabric creates easily movable louvres, which can be adjusted at will to allow as much or as little light in as you like. Use in a chic, contemporary home office with plenty of whites or creams, and the occasional hint of silver every now and again. Or instead, accent brightly coloured walls in the dining room by placing the spun pearl right in the middle, to create a much-needed break.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), cream - vertical blind don't be fooled by the pale, dainty shade of the palermo (blackout) in cream, as this is a durable, sturdy blind that will last you for years. With adjustable louvres, this blind allows you to control the light e
products.productdescription: Don't be fooled by the pale, dainty shade of the palermo (blackout) in cream, as this is a durable, sturdy blind that will last you for years. With adjustable louvres, this blind allows you to control the light easily, and you'll enjoy the way the light bounces off the sheen of the fabric. Versatile by nature, the cream will go with almost any colour scheme you have in mind, making it the perfect choice for rooms such as the bathroom or kitchen, where you can keep the overall shades the same, whilst changing out bold accents as the mood takes you.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), oyster - vertical blind the oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost
products.productdescription: The oyster blind, from the origin (blackout) range, is subtlety at its best. The soft cream fabric radiates luxurious sophistication, whilst still maintaining a confident neutrality that helps it to match almost any colour. For a country, shaker-style kitchen, sit the oyster amongst matching cream units, with wooden worktops and rustic furniture, accompanied by pretty florals and vintage-style appliances. Or treat the bathroom to a similar dcor scheme, using soft pinks and garden greens to accent this pretty louvre blind.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Origin (blackout), oyster grey - vertical blind so subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a m
products.productdescription: So subtle in colour that it's barely there, the origin (blackout) in oyster grey offers just a hint of colour to blend in beautifully with existing dcor. Despite its understated texture and hue, this is a mighty blackout blind, ideal for blocking out the outside light. For a neutral look in a home office or bedroom, team the oyster grey with taupes and soft greys, to add calm and serenity to your home. This is the model blind to use as a taming accent in an otherwise bold room that needs something soft and discreet to break it up.
